txt.en: The Path of the Masterful Fist allows your attack to infuriate your enemies, causing them to turn their attention to you, giving your companions a welcome reprieve from their enemies' onslaught.
The Path of the Masterful Fist
You have begun to follow the Path of the Masterful Fist. If you follow this path to its end, you will learn how to draw the ire of your enemies, keeping your companions safe.
Begin to follow the Path of the Masterful Fist
There are many challenges on along the Path of the Masterful Fist. Taking the first step may be the most difficult....
